node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #4912 宗個案患者的兒子。因要接受眼部手術，9 月 8 日到伊利沙伯醫院提交深喉唾液樣本，測試結果呈陰性；9 日在香港眼科醫院接受手術，其間其母接獲確診通知，患者手術後再接受深喉唾液測試結果變為陽性。母子二人在 9 月 10 日接受血清抗體測試，結果呈陽性，代表二人可能較早前已受感染。
node.detail_en: The patient is the son of patient #4912 and turned in a deep throat saliva sample at Queen Elizabeth Hospital on September 8 prior to his eye operation, which tested negative for the virus. During his operation on September 9 at Hong Kong Eye Hospital, his mother received notification regarding her diagnosis during his operation. He re-tested after the operation with deep throat saliva sample and tested positive. Both of them took a serologic test on September 10 and tested positive, meaning that they may have been infected earlier on.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
